page.title: 09"MY SPARE TIME JOB"
page.content: My name is Estelle I am 11 years old. When I get home from school I help in my parent's chip shop.My father peels the potatoes in a special machine and put them in the cutter that makes them into chips.My mother puts the chips in the range to be cooked.Then we serve the chips.A portion of chips is 30p and a large portion is 35p,a pie is 47p and a small pie is 40p. We also sell:curry, gravy, beans, rissoles, sausage, sausage rolls, pasties, fish, pancake rolls, beefburgers, drinks and sweets. I start work at 7.30 and finish at 10.00.I work four nights a week and earn Â£4.00.I don't really like working in the shop but my parents make me do it.
